description:
**Tool Overview**:

This method allows users to check the version of their Microsoft Edge browser, which can be important for ensuring that the browser is up to date and no longer vulnerable to known issues such as CVE-2024-0223. **Instructions**:

1. Open your **Microsoft Edge** browser.
2. Click on the three dots (**...**) located at the very right-hand side of the window.
3. Navigate to **Help and feedback**.
4. Click on **About Microsoft Edge**.
5. The version information will be displayed, allowing users to confirm whether they are running a secure version.

This method is particularly relevant in light of the recent updates pertaining to vulnerabilities that may affect Chromium-based browsers. Keeping your browser updated is crucial in maintaining security and stability.
